Params: {3: "DEAD MASTER's domain gradually collapses, the surroundings reverting to their pre-battle state."}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "Isn't it about time you let me go?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: "I'm a bit reluctant to admit it... But with this...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A victor has been declared in this game.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: 'What...? What just happened? I opened the door and then... what took place?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha\'s eyes are drawn to the "King", a solitary figure standing before the throne.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "What's wrong, not a fan of lively scenes?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "That room couldn't host so many people, so I thought we'd move elsewhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Indeed, you've won. How does it feel, exhilarating?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "I've said it before, even if you win, nothing will change.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: "We're just circling back to the beginning.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm slowly coming to terms with this reality.", 3: '41', 4: 'In other words, now is also the "beginning."', 5: '41'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'No matter where you go or how fate twists and turns, "you" will never change... right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'This would be the ideal moment to conclude the chapter if there were more space.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'But this is a story born from an "error."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'King', 3: 'Perhaps it should end in an "erroneous" way.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In the blink of an eye, the "King" makes her move.'}
{3: 'She summons a crimson rapier, aiming it at you.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Lucia is the first to react, trying to activate her thruster to block the King's path, but her feet are suddenly ensnared by crimson thorns bursting from the ground."}
{3: 'The rapier rapidly approaches, but at that moment, your eyes catch a glimpse of crimson lightning.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Alpha raises her sword in defense, but to her surprise, the "King" neither dodges nor deflects Alpha\'s attack.'}
{3: 'Instead, she allows the blade to pierce through her chest.'}
{3: 'The "King\'s" smile is twisted as she grips Alpha\'s hand, guiding the blade deeper into her wound, inch by inch.'}
{3: 'The deeper the blade penetrates, the closer she gets to Alpha.'}
{3: 'As the "King" draws nearer, a soft glow emanates from Alpha\'s left hand, hinting at the stirring of her dormant Punishing Virus.'}
{3: 'A deep red energy seeps out, finally forming a storm that envelops them both.'}
{3: 'A girl is sitting at a distance, picking up scattered chess pieces from the ground and resetting them on the board.'}
{3: 'She steps closer to the girl, who also notices her.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Do you remember what Mom and Dad used to tell you, Luna?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "One day, you'll have to go home on your own.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'When you get home, I will be there waiting for you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl stands up, gives her a lingering look, and begins to walk away.'}
{3: "The King's figure starts to fade away, her words of malice left hanging in the air."}
{3: 'Feeling the Punishing energy within her calm down, Alpha turns around to face Lucia and the others.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'We all know what we must do next.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: "This alternate-dimensional space hasn't collapsed yet.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'The creator of the castle is gone, but her "influence" still lingers.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: "Wait... what are you trying to do? Shouldn't this be something for the Craftsman to handle...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: "Eh? Where did the Craftsman go? She's gone?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "I've achieved my goal. What happens next is irrelevant to me, but...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'My purpose has never changed from the beginning.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Feeling the hostility emanating from those blue eyes, Lucia instinctively readies her sword in response.'}
{2: 'We are an unexpected "error" to Corridor.', 3: '183', 4: 'To them, our existence is no different from the "King".', 5: '183'}
{2: "I'm afraid that going forward, many Mental Images will see us as the enemy.", 3: '184'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But we were allies just moments ago...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We are "errors," things that must be eradicated...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Even so... a world that can only tolerate "correctness" is in itself the biggest "error."', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'So, how will you prove it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Two red katanas aim in the same direction, as ice and thunder start to resonate together.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Fida', 3: "Hey! What are you guys doing?! Hasn't everything already ended?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Intimidated by the standoff, Fida steps back in fear.'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'The battle between me and my dear "nemesis" has indeed come to a pause.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'DEAD MASTER', 3: 'But the fight with my "best friend" is just beginning.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Clutching her scythe, DEAD MASTER moves to stand beside BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER.'}
{2: 'Fida', 3: 'I have no interest in stirring up trouble here with you all...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not all fights stem from hatred and hostility.', 3: '225'}
{2: "Our journey isn't over; it seems we'll be lingering here a bit longer.", 3: '226'}
{3: 'With a heart full of questions, she summons her courage, lifts her head, and faces this newly transformed "battlefield."'}
{3: 'She captures the silhouettes of the four individuals in her eyes.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'For a moment, she feels the fleeting gaze of the girl in black.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'BLACK★ROCK SHOOTER', 3: 'This is the beginning of a new "conflict".', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Then, the girl's eye ignites with a flame.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She sees burning meteors, and icy comet tails.'}
{3: 'Not just a single conclusion, but a myriad of possibilities.'}
